name: ALIVE (itch) (ecwalsh)
description:
ALIVE is a game prototype created as part of the Spring 2016 Interactive Narrative course at RPI. Simulating the rhythm of a conversation, it places the player in communication with an imagined AI created in a government experiment as it attempts to figure out its place in the world. ALIVE is eventually intended for mobile release.

Debugging Commands:

A : show current values for the AI's metrics

M: show quick node selection menu
